PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: reported a conjugated copolymer of NDI and bithiophene ; 10 OFET devices based on this polymer fabricated in a top-gate , bottom - contact configuration with polymeric dielectrics exhibited μ e of 0.1-0.85 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 under ambient conditions with I on / I off > 10^5 .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| μe |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "Ion/Ioff" (this is a ratio of ionic currents and not a material property)

Therefore, the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph are:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| μe |

μe refers to the mobility of the material, which is a measure of how easily charged particles (such as ions or electrons) can move through the material.
